breakfast.name_base: 老鼎丰 / Lao Ding Feng (Zhongyang Street)
breakfast.name_local: 老鼎丰(哈尔滨中央大街店)
breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 锅包肉, 冻梨, 传统糕点
breakfast.notes_local: 百年老字号哈尔滨糕点店，始建于1911年。中央大街上的绝佳早餐地点。
breakfast.notes_base: Historic Harbin bakery established in 1911, famous for traditional northeastern pastries. Perfect breakfast spot on Zhongyang Street before sightseeing.

lunch.name_base: 索菲娅俄式西餐厅 / Sofiya Russian Restaurant (Zhongyang Street)
lunch.name_local: 索菲娅俄式西餐厅(中央大街店)

lunch.location_local: 红专街91号 / 91 Hongzhuan Street (430m from Zhongyang Street Station)
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Borscht, beef stroganoff, Russian-style red sausage
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 红菜汤, 奶油牛肉, 俄式红肠
lunch.notes_local: 正宗俄式西餐，体现哈尔滨与俄罗斯的历史渊源。靠近圣索菲亚教堂。
lunch.notes_base: Authentic Russian cuisine reflecting Harbin's historical connection with Russia. Near Saint Sophia Cathedral.

dinner.name_base: 老松滨东北菜馆 / Lao Song Bin Northeast Cuisine (Harbin Sunac Mall)

dinner.location_local: 融创茂三层3050号 / 3rd Floor, Unit 3050, Harbin Sunac Mall

dinner.signature_dishes_local: 锅包肉, 猪肉炖粉条, 地三鲜
dinner.notes_local: 高评分正宗东北菜餐厅。位于哈尔滨融创茂内，靠近冰雪大世界。
dinner.notes_base: Highly-rated authentic Dongbei restaurant. Located in modern shopping mall near Ice and Snow World.

breakfast.name_base: 司清烘焙 / Siqing Bakery (Zhongyang Street)
breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 现烤糕点, 咖啡, 俄式面包
breakfast.notes_local: 中央大街附近的时尚烘焙店，早餐选择丰富。
breakfast.notes_base: Modern bakery near Zhongyang Street with quality breakfast options.

lunch.name_base: 六泰居·尔滨地标·东北菜 / Liu Tai Ju Northeast Cuisine (Aibian Store)

lunch.signature_dishes_local: 锅包肉, 排骨炖豆角, 酸菜炖粉条
lunch.notes_local: 哈尔滨知名连锁东北菜，正宗东北风味。全市多家分店。
lunch.notes_base: Famous Harbin chain known for authentic Northeast dishes. Multiple locations across the city.

dinner.name_base: 沿江饺子东北菜 / Yan Jiang Dumplings & Northeast Cuisine (Zhongyang Street)
dinner.name_local: 沿江饺子东北菜(哈尔滨中央大街店)

dinner.notes_local: 专营传统东北水饺。品尝正宗东北家常味道的好去处。
dinner.notes_base: Specializes in traditional Northeast dumplings. Great place to taste authentic Dongbei home cooking.

breakfast.name_base: 连兴成 / Lian Xing Cheng (Binjiang Road)
breakfast.location_base: 滨江道72号 / 72 Binjiang Road (290m from Heping Road Metro)
breakfast.location_local: 滨江道72号 / 72 Binjiang Road (290m from Heping Road Metro)
breakfast.signature_dishes_base: Jianbing guozi, douhua, fried dough sticks
breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 煎饼果子, 豆花, 油条
breakfast.notes_local: 正宗天津早餐名店。一定要尝尝传统煎饼果子。
breakfast.notes_base: Famous for authentic Tianjin breakfast specialties. Try the traditional jianbing.

lunch.name_base: 青年餐厅 / Qingnian Restaurant (Jinwan Plaza)

lunch.location_local: 解放北路津湾广场A栋 / Jinwan Plaza Block A, Jiefang North Road

lunch.notes_local: 位于津湾广场，可欣赏海河风光。老牌餐厅，经典天津菜。
lunch.notes_base: Located at scenic Jinwan Plaza with views of Hai River. Well-established restaurant with classic Tianjin fare.

dinner.name_local: 狗不理(天津·海河意式风情区店)

dinner.signature_dishes_base: Stuffed steamed buns, eight-treasure rice, traditional Tianjin dishes

dinner.notes_local: 160年老字号，联合国教科文组织非遗品牌。一定要尝招牌包子。
dinner.notes_base: Famous 160-year-old brand, UNESCO-recognized intangible cultural heritage. Try the signature steamed buns.

breakfast.name_base: 邢老三肉丸胡辣汤 / Xing Laosan Meatball Hu La Tang (Bell Tower)

breakfast.location_local: 北大街钟楼新街里 / Zhonglou New Street, Bei Dajie (30m from Bell Tower Metro Exit B)

breakfast.notes_local: 正宗本地早餐店。胡辣汤是西安必尝早餐。
breakfast.notes_base: Authentic local breakfast spot. Hu la tang is a must-try Xi'an breakfast specialty.

lunch.name_base: 长安大牌档 / Chang'an Dapaidang (North Street)
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Biangbiang noodles, roujiamo, liangpi cold noodles
lunch.signature_dishes_local: BiangBiang面, 肉夹馍, 凉皮
lunch.notes_local: 传统陕菜的现代演绎。西安美食文化的绝佳入门。
lunch.notes_base: Modern interpretation of traditional Shaanxi cuisine. Great introduction to Xi'an food culture.

dinner.name_base: 西安贾三灌汤包·回坊小吃 / Jia San Soup Dumplings (Muslim Quarter)

dinner.location_local: 回民街北院门93号 / 93 Beiyuanmen, Muslim Quarter (near Drum Tower)

dinner.notes_local: 回民街标志性餐厅。正宗清真西安美食。一定要尝招牌灌汤包。
dinner.notes_base: Iconic Muslim Quarter restaurant. Famous for authentic halal Xi'an food. Try the signature soup dumplings.

breakfast.name_base: 德发长饺子·非遗 / Defachang Dumplings (Bell Tower)
breakfast.name_local: 德发长饺子·非遗(钟楼店)

breakfast.location_local: 西大街3号 / 3 West Street (140m from Bell Tower Metro Exit 1)
breakfast.signature_dishes_base: Dumpling feast banquet, traditional Northern dumplings, hot soy milk

breakfast.notes_local: 非遗品牌，始创于1936年。以饺子宴闻名。
breakfast.notes_base: Intangible cultural heritage brand, established 1936. Famous for dumpling banquets.

lunch.name_base: 仓颉院子·传统陕菜 / Cangjie Courtyard Traditional Shaanxi Cuisine (Bell Tower)
lunch.name_local: 仓颉院子·传统陕菜(钟楼店)

lunch.notes_local: 高端传统陕菜餐厅，现代摆盘。体验精致陕菜的好去处。
lunch.notes_base: Upscale traditional Shaanxi restaurant with modern presentation. Good for experiencing refined Shaanxi cuisine.

dinner.name_base: 老刘家泡馍·陕西老字号 / Lao Liu Jia Paomo (Bell Tower)
dinner.name_local: 老刘家泡馍.陕西老字号(钟鼓楼广济街)

dinner.location_local: 北广济街101号 / 101 North Guangji Street (290m from Guangji Street Metro Exit A1)
dinner.signature_dishes_base: Lamb paomo with hand-torn bread, beef paomo, garlic cucumbers
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 羊肉泡馍, 牛肉泡馍, 蒜泥黄瓜
dinner.notes_local: 专营西安最著名的泡馍。正宗做法，分量十足。
dinner.notes_base: Historic brand specializing in Xi'an's most famous dish - paomo. Authentic preparation and generous portions.

breakfast.name_base: 同得兴·苏式面馆·三虾面 / Tongdexing Suzhou Noodles (Pingjiang Road)

breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 三虾面, 红油馄饨, 葱油拌面
breakfast.notes_local: 苏式面馆。三虾面是当地名吃。平江路上的绝佳早餐地点。
breakfast.notes_base: Specializes in Suzhou-style noodles. The three shrimp noodles are a local delicacy. Perfect breakfast spot on Pingjiang Road.

lunch.name_base: 金海华·平江颂 / Jin Haihua Pingjiang Song

lunch.location_local: 平江街道大儒巷54号 / 54 Daru Alley, Pingjiang Street
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Squirrel-shaped mandarin fish, sweet and sour spare ribs, Biluochun shrimp
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 松鼠鳜鱼, 糖醋排骨, 碧螺虾仁
lunch.notes_local: 高端苏帮菜餐厅。体验精致苏式菜肴的好去处。
lunch.notes_base: Upscale Suzhou restaurant specializing in traditional Suzhou dishes. Good for experiencing refined local cuisine.

dinner.signature_dishes_base: Squirrel mandarin fish, Suzhou braised pork, seasonal river delicacies
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 松鼠鳜鱼, 苏式红烧肉, 时令河鲜
dinner.notes_local: 创建于1757年，苏州最著名的餐厅之一。必尝招牌松鼠鳜鱼。建议预约。
dinner.notes_base: Founded 1757, one of Suzhou's most famous restaurants. Must-try: signature squirrel fish. Reservations recommended.

breakfast.name_base: 知味观 / Zhiweiguan (Baochu Road Dimsum Branch)
breakfast.name_local: 知味观(保俶路点心分店)
breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 小笼包, 烧麦, 猫耳朵
breakfast.notes_local: 杭州百年老字号，始创于1913年。传统杭州早点和点心。靠近西湖。
breakfast.notes_base: Historic Hangzhou brand established 1913. Famous for traditional Hangzhou breakfast and dim sum. Near West Lake.

lunch.name_base: 楼外楼 / Lou Wai Lou (West Lake Scenic Area)
lunch.name_local: 楼外楼(杭州西湖风景名胜区店)

lunch.location_local: 西湖街道孤山路30号 / 30 Gushan Road, West Lake Street (near Pinghu Qiuyue)

lunch.notes_local: 170年历史的标志性餐厅，坐拥西湖美景。必尝杭州经典菜。建议提前预订湖景座位。
lunch.notes_base: Iconic 170-year-old restaurant with stunning West Lake views. Must-try Hangzhou classics. Book ahead for lake-view tables.

dinner.name_base: 外婆家 / Grandma's Home (West Lake Broken Bridge)
dinner.signature_dishes_base: Grandma's braised pork, tea-smoked chicken, stir-fried river shrimp
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 外婆红烧肉, 茶香鸡, 清炒河虾
dinner.notes_local: 人气连锁餐厅，优质杭帮家常菜，价格实惠。湖边位置，风景优美。
dinner.notes_base: Popular chain offering quality Hangzhou home cooking at reasonable prices. Lakeside location with great views.

breakfast.name_base: 花桥荣记桂林米粉 / Huaqiao Rongji Guilin Rice Noodles (Xungen Branch)

breakfast.notes_local: 正宗桂林米粉，当地必尝特色。每日现做鲜粉。漓江游船前的快速早餐。
breakfast.notes_base: Authentic Guilin rice noodles, a must-try local specialty. Fresh noodles made daily. Quick breakfast before Li River cruise.

lunch.name_local: 阳朔河边餐厅(船上或抵达后)

lunch.signature_dishes_local: 漓江清蒸鱼, 竹筒饭, 炒空心菜
lunch.notes_local: 漓江游船途中或到达阳朔后午餐。抵达后河边有很多选择。
lunch.notes_base: Lunch during or after Li River cruise. Many riverside options in Yangshuo upon arrival.

dinner.notes_base: Yangshuo's most famous dish - beer fish. Award-winning restaurant on West Street. Perfect dinner after Li River cruise.

breakfast.name_base: 杨哥正宗桂林米粉 / Yang Ge Authentic Guilin Rice Noodles

breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 桂林卤肉米粉, 酸菜
breakfast.notes_local: 阳朔当地人气米粉店。实惠正宗。
breakfast.notes_base: Local favorite for authentic Guilin rice noodles in Yangshuo. Budget-friendly and authentic.

lunch.name_base: 椿记烧鹅 / Chun Ji Roast Goose (West Street)

lunch.location_local: 叠翠路92号, 阳朔 / 92 Diecui Road, Yangshuo
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Crispy roast goose, char siu BBQ pork, honey-glazed roast duck
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 脆皮烧鹅, 叉烧, 蜜汁烤鸭
lunch.notes_local: 以粤式烧腊闻名。遇龙河竹筏漂流后的午餐好选择。
lunch.notes_base: Famous for Cantonese-style roast meats. Good lunch option after morning bamboo rafting on Yulong River.

dinner.name_base: 谢三姐金奖啤酒鱼 / Xie Sanjie Gold Award Beer Fish (Main Store)

dinner.signature_dishes_local: 啤酒鱼, 爆炒田螺, 桂林米粉
dinner.notes_local: 另一家获奖啤酒鱼餐厅。想换个口味尝当地特色的好选择。
dinner.notes_base: Another award-winning beer fish restaurant. Great option if you want to try a different take on the local specialty.

breakfast.name_base: 景区内早餐 / Breakfast inside scenic area

breakfast.notes_local: 景区内酒店或简餐。选择有限但方便早起出发。建议带零食。
breakfast.notes_base: Breakfast at hotel or simple restaurants inside park. Limited options but convenient for early start. Bring snacks.

lunch.notes_local: 景区附近的家庭餐馆。正宗土家族特色菜。简单但丰盛。
lunch.notes_base: Family-run restaurant near scenic area. Authentic local Tujia minority cuisine. Simple but hearty.

dinner.name_base: 土家野菜馆 / Tujia Wild Vegetables Restaurant

dinner.notes_local: 专营土家族菜肴和山中野菜。正宗当地风味。
dinner.notes_base: Specializes in Tujia ethnic cuisine with wild vegetables from the mountains. Authentic local flavors.

breakfast.name_base: 点都德 / Dian Dou De (Beijing Road 1st Branch)

breakfast.notes_base: Premium Guangzhou dim sum chain. Famous for traditional morning tea experience. Must-try Cantonese yum cha.

lunch.name_base: 蓉楼茶居 / Rong Lou Tea House (Yuexiu Park Xiaobei)

lunch.location_local: 小北路260号4楼 / 4th Floor, 260 Xiaobei Road (100m from Xiaobei Metro Exit A)
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Assorted dim sum, roast goose, congee with century egg
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 精选点心拼盘, 烧鹅, 皮蛋瘦肉粥
lunch.notes_local: 越秀公园附近的传统茶楼。午后点心或参观广州塔后午餐的好去处。
lunch.notes_base: Traditional tea house near Yuexiu Park. Good for afternoon dim sum or lunch after visiting Canton Tower.

dinner.name_base: 汤宴汇·广府融合菜·早茶 / Tang Yan Hui Cantonese Fusion (Lujiang Store)
dinner.name_local: 汤宴汇·广府融合菜·早茶(鹭江店)
dinner.signature_dishes_base: Cantonese soup of the day, white-cut chicken, steamed fish
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 老火靓汤, 白切鸡, 清蒸鱼
dinner.notes_local: 以高品质靓汤和创意融合菜闻名的现代粤菜餐厅。
dinner.notes_base: Modern Cantonese restaurant known for high-quality soups and fusion dishes. Good dinner option.

breakfast.name_base: 深圳早餐 / Shenzhen breakfast (hotel or nearby)
breakfast.signature_dishes_base: Dim sum, congee, cheung fun rice rolls
breakfast.notes_local: 过关前在深圳快速早餐。留着胃口吃香港美食。
breakfast.notes_base: Quick hotel breakfast before crossing to Hong Kong. Save appetite for Hong Kong food.

lunch.name_base: Tim Ho Wan / 添好运 (Hong Kong Station)
lunch.location_base: Shop 12A & 12B, Level 1, MTR Hong Kong Station, Central, Hong Kong
lunch.location_local: Shop 12A & 12B, Level 1, MTR Hong Kong Station, Central, Hong Kong
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Baked BBQ pork buns, steamed shrimp dumplings, egg tarts
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 酥皮焗叉烧包, 鲜虾蒸饺, 蛋挞
lunch.notes_local: 世界最便宜的米其林星级餐厅。物美价廉的优质点心。排队可能较长。
lunch.notes_base: World's cheapest Michelin-starred restaurant. Famous for quality dim sum at affordable prices. Expect queues.

dinner.name_base: Dim Sum Here / 点点心 (Jordan Temple Street)
dinner.location_base: 298 Temple Street, Jordan, Hong Kong (basement level)
dinner.location_local: 298 Temple Street, Jordan, Hong Kong (basement level)
dinner.signature_dishes_base: Creative truffle dumplings, crystal shrimp rolls, custard buns
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 松露蒸饺, 水晶虾卷, 流沙包
dinner.notes_local: 庙街夜市附近的人气本地点心店。晚餐后可逛夜市。
dinner.notes_base: Popular local dim sum spot near Temple Street Night Market. Great location for dinner then night market exploration.

breakfast.name_base: One Dim Sum / 一点心 (Prince Edward)
breakfast.location_base: G/F, 209A Tung Choi Street, Prince Edward, Hong Kong
breakfast.location_local: G/F, 209A Tung Choi Street, Prince Edward, Hong Kong
breakfast.signature_dishes_base: Steamed shrimp dumplings, BBQ pork buns, turnip cake
breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 鲜虾蒸饺, 叉烧包, 萝卜糕
breakfast.notes_local: 获奖点心餐厅。前往大屿山前的美味早餐。高品质实惠价格。
breakfast.notes_base: Award-winning dim sum restaurant. Great breakfast before heading to Lantau Island. High quality at reasonable prices.

lunch.name_base: Ngong Ping / 昂坪 (Lantau Island restaurant)
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Vegetarian set meal, noodle soup, tofu dishes
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 素斋套餐, 汤面, 豆腐菜品
lunch.notes_local: 昂坪大佛附近午餐。选择有限，可考虑宝莲禅寺附近素食。
lunch.notes_base: Lunch at Ngong Ping near Big Buddha. Limited options, consider vegetarian food near Po Lin Monastery.

dinner.name_base: Margaret's Café e Nata / 玛嘉烈蛋挞店
dinner.location_base: 66 Patio do Cmte. Mata e Oliveira, Macau
dinner.location_local: 66 Patio do Cmte. Mata e Oliveira, Macau
dinner.signature_dishes_base: Portuguese egg tarts, serradura pudding, custard pastries
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 葡式蛋挞, 木糠布甸, 奶油酥饼
dinner.notes_local: 澳门最著名的蛋挞店。必尝正宗葡式蛋挞。附近还有葡国餐厅可用晚餐。
dinner.notes_base: Macau's most famous egg tart shop. Must-try authentic Portuguese egg tarts. Also try nearby Portuguese restaurants for dinner.
